mapper.sql: id, hall_id, uid, type, status, approver_uid, create_time, update_time, approve_time, reason, remark
mapper.insert: insert into guild_hall_apply_record (id, hall_id, uid, type, status, approver_uid, create_time, update_time, approve_time, reason, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approverUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into guild_hall_apply_record
id,
hall_id,
uid,
type,
status,
approver_uid,
create_time,
update_time,
approve_time,
reason,
remark,

#{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update guild_hall_apply_record
hall_id = #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
approver_uid = #{approverUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update guild_hall_apply_record set hall_id = #{hallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approver_uid = #{approverUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select jr.id, jr.hall_id as hallId, r.title as hallTitle, jr.uid, jr.status, jr.approver_uid as approverUid, jr.create_time as createTime, jr.approve_time as approverTime, jr.reason, g.id as guildId, u.nick, u.erban_no as erbanNo, u2.nick as approverNick from guild_hall_apply_record jr inner join guild_hall h on h.id=jr.hall_id inner join room r on h.room_id=r.room_id inner join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id inner join users u on jr.uid=u.uid left join users u2 on jr.approver_uid=u2.uid where g.is_del=false and h.is_del=false and jr.uid = #{uid} and jr.type=#{type} and jr.status=#{status}

select jr.id, jr.hall_id as hallId, r.title as hallTitle, jr.uid, jr.type, jr.status, jr.approver_uid as approverUid, jr.create_time as createTime, jr.approve_time as approverTime, jr.reason, g.id as guildId, u.nick, u.erban_no as erbanNo, u2.nick as approverNick from guild_hall_apply_record jr inner join guild_hall h on h.id=jr.hall_id inner join room r on h.room_id=r.room_id inner join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id inner join users u on jr.uid=u.uid left join users u2 on jr.approver_uid=u2.uid where g.is_del=false and h.is_del=false and (jr.type=0 or jr.type=1) and h.guild_id=#{guildId} order by jr.create_time desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

select jr.id, jr.hall_id as hallId, r.title as hallTitle, jr.uid, jr.type, jr.status, jr.approver_uid as approverUid, jr.create_time as createTime, jr.approve_time as approverTime, jr.reason, g.id as guildId, u.nick, u.erban_no as erbanNo, u2.nick as approverNick from guild_hall_apply_record jr inner join guild_hall h on h.id=jr.hall_id inner join room r on h.room_id=r.room_id inner join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id inner join users u on jr.uid=u.uid left join users u2 on jr.approver_uid=u2.uid where g.is_del=false and h.is_del=false and (jr.type=0 or jr.type=1) and h.id=#{hallId} order by jr.create_time desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

select count(jr.id) from guild_hall_apply_record jr inner join guild_hall h on h.id=jr.hall_id inner join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id where g.is_del=false and h.is_del=false and h.guild_id = #{guildId} and (jr.type=0 or jr.type=1) and jr.status=#{status}

select count(jr.id) from guild_hall_apply_record jr inner join guild_hall h on h.id=jr.hall_id inner join guild g on g.id=h.guild_id where g.is_del=false and h.is_del=false and jr.hall_id = #{hallId} and (jr.type=0 or jr.type=1) and jr.status=#{status}
